website_summaries.verdict: A large, well-constructed dry bag that can hold a lot without weighing you down.
pros: Exterior splash-proof pocket for easy access to important items
Large storage capacity without being too bulky
cons: The zippered pocket is not waterproof, so don't store anything electronic in there

customer_reviews.title: Rolled kayak in Rapids. Everything dry.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the small and large bag. Once you fold the top down four times the amount of contents you can actually fit inside is limited. But the bag does work wonderfully. We also like the bright yellow. The bright color comes in handy just in case your bag falls over board. Leave a little air in the bag is helpful too so that it will float. My husband rolled his kayak in the rapids. The bag was securely tethered down and remained secured on the kayak. His keys were in the side pocket. Everything remained very dry. The quality of the bag is great.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A White

customer_reviews.title: The 20 L bag is perfect as a ditch bag on a boat -- it ...
customer_reviews.text: The 20 L bag is perfect as a ditch bag on a boat -- it fits (with lots of room to spare) a handheld VHF radio, a few 500 ml bottles of fresh water, GPS, flares, flashlight, whistle, bright colored flag, and a small life jacket (because of the extra buoyancy it provides, but also a spare). It is well made and seems to put up with some abuse that we've already put it through.
customer_reviews.author: Broken foot

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my valuables dry and safe!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag for kayak trips, and it has worked great! It is large enough to hold a beach towel, our cell phones, and car keys, with room to spare. I tested the bag at home with random objects inside, and it remained water-tight. On the river, I feel confident that my cell phone is safe from water damage, and will definitely pack this bag for any water-centered activities!
customer_reviews.author: Teacher<3Mom

customer_reviews.title: we lost a really nice tablet to a cheaper dry bag
customer_reviews.text: we lost a really nice tablet to a cheaper dry bag :/ lesson learned on with the new better bag really impressed w/ Sak Gear no worries with their seams leaking ! good price as well as top notch service before and after purchase thank you guys !! Kudos
customer_reviews.author: CHAching

customer_reviews.title: Great bag. Kept everything nice IN the bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Kept everything nice IN the bag. The problem: zipper compartment did not keep anything dry. Money and credit cards were soaked. Do NOT put a phone in that pouch! So keep everything important inside of the bag and everything will be nice and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Survived a waterfall
customer_reviews.text: Great dry bag - love the front pocket. We go Kayaking a lot and the first time I took this bag along I was not let down! It was comfy to sling over my shoulder/chest and it floated behind me while swimming and I even used it to help me float in the water. It survived a water fall jump and It fit everything I needed to take : extra shirt, phone and little first aid kit and some small snacks. the only time it had some water drops inside was from me opening and closing it so much. Love this thing! I'll be taking it everywhere now.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley H Lingerfelt

customer_reviews.title: phone and a few snacks inside for a day of sailing and it works great. The detachable strap is linked around one of ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband as he is now retired and has a sailboat. He LOVES it. Keeps his keys, phone and a few snacks inside for a day of sailing and it works great. The detachable strap is linked around one of the handles of the boat so it stays in place and when he is done, he unooks it and brings it home. What a nice sak.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy in Indy

customer_reviews.title: Really waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Really Strong waterproof bag.It's been jet ski-ing boating, ffully submerged in water. Contents stay dry. I have a slight hole after a full summer of weekend hardcore use. But that make sense how I have it rigged to my ski (no storage bin) Plastic clips looks like they warped and weakened after 3 months of hard use/tugging (Like I said tied around my ski outside of a storage bin so it banged around alot) . So I got scared of a clip breaking and I just boguth some cheap metal binding clips to have a fail safe. Otherwise awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Victor R.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use on the boat. They work GREAT. I don't bother with the zipper pocket on the outside, once it's full it's too hard to get into that pocket. Everything stays nice and dry, we just toss it in the skiff, row out to the boat. Can fit couple of towels, phones, bathing suit, iphones, other small goods. If you have a boat, it's a must. We also use it to bring food out to the boat, can fit quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Piddlypuss

customer_reviews.title: A nice boat bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to have waterproof storage for car keys, phones, and medicine aboard my open hull vessel. I think it will serve that purpose well. Further, I like how many color options there are available. I went with white to match my boat and the 20 liter size for extra space. The bag itself feels of quality construction, i.e., the buckles, fastening, and stitching. The bag appears to be entirely waterproof when you place items in the main bag section. I am unsure of the quick access zipper pocket on the front. All in all, I am very pleased with this bag for my use in a boat.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Survived Jamaican Honeymoon
customer_reviews.text: I waited to review this item until we got back from our honeymoon in Jamaica. I used this bag as my carryon for the flight and we took it to the beach, climbed Dunn's River Falls, as well as several other excursions. This bag is awesome. It kept everything dry as a bone even when we were soaking wet and sandy. I would recommend the bigger bag as a beach bag, because this one was snug to get our stuff in, but other than that, it's awesome. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Not at all as described. Useless!
customer_reviews.text: Not as pictured or described. It is not waterproof. The top does not even close or seal.
customer_reviews.author: Micheal James

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality! This 10 gallon is perfect for containing ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality! This 10 gallon is perfect for containing the contents of a medium sized purse. I tend to roll it up a couple extra times to ensure waterproofing so this takes away from cubic spacing. If you are wanting to use this bag for large items or even as a " discrete cooler" for beer or soda I would suggest a 20 gallon. Love that you can easy clasp the strap to be worn messenger style or simply clasp to dangle on the inner aspect of a raft. Will be getting more of these. Considering as gifts for friends, got lots of complements and questions from inquiring minds.
customer_reviews.author: LiveOutLoud

customer_reviews.title: I pour water out every time.
customer_reviews.text: I swim out to a boat for work by holding onto a scooter. Very minimal exposure to going under water at all. When I climb on the boat, it’s become habit from my teammates to take my fins, mask, and then watch me unroll my bag and dump the water out from inside. Worst bag ever for actually keeping anything dry. I have to buy a different bag just to be able to pack a lunch that will stay dry.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: perfect!! Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Didnt expect much when I got it, but took it out on a charter trip, perfect !! Heavy duty, but light, easy to close after a few timescan make it as small or big as you want. I got yellow to see it easily.
customer_reviews.author: Deeman

customer_reviews.title: After several trials (and my errors)
customer_reviews.text: So I live in israel and we do not leave handguns in cars. It’s illegal and could allow a terrorist to acquire a deadly weapon. At the same time I hate leaving my handgun locked up in the safe at home (what good does it do me there). Sooo when I go to the beach (with all that salty water) I need to keep salt water (and sand) out. The only issue is when opening the watertight bag — water on the exterior will dribble in. I solved that by putting a microfiber towel inside with the handgun. Great bag. I will buy for my sons when they are issued their handguns.
customer_reviews.author: Bracha

customer_reviews.title: Buy this dry bag!
customer_reviews.text: Love this dry sack! I bought this to add another one to my upcoming 4 day kayak trip. Its as good as the sea line and sea to summit ones I typically buy. I will definitely buy more from them. I love the fact there is a shoulder strap. Another great feature is the zipper pocket on the exterior. It's not super large but can hold car keys and a small wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for 3 weeks straight on different boats, scuba diving and sailing. Everything inside remained dry despite some good splashes and water in the bottom of the boat. I did push the limit with it though (on purpose) and tried it out on a short swim. About a cup of water did get inside but I expected it would and let the DrySak folks know about my little experiment. The company is super friendly and quick to respond to any inquiries. Service like that is rare This was nice to compact down when I didn't have a lot to carry, just keep rolling! Will definitely buy another smaller one and I trust this company. Thanks DrySak folks!
customer_reviews.author: Airportchick11

customer_reviews.title: Truly a "dry" sak -- Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Drysak ever -- I selected the smaller size of the two sizes and the color yellow because of safety and ease of locating if I lost it in the water. I have been using my sak primarily for my kayaking excursions -- its kept my electronics dry as a bone. It floats perfect and is easy to spot. The zip pocket in the front is too small for my Moto Z cell phone:( - I use this pocket for cash, drivers lic, whistle only as it is not very deep or wide. I purchased a blue one for my sister and as far as I know she lovers hers too.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Arrived w/ Broken Clip
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t even bother unpacking due to seeing the broken clip as soon as I opened the box. Item is useless if clips are broken.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size to take towels and keep valuables safe and dry on our kayaking trips. We run the shoulder strap through the handle of the kayak to keep it from falling out of the kayak. We will be buying larger saks to be able to take sleeping bags on overnight kayaking/camping trips.
customer_reviews.author: troybuilt1968

customer_reviews.title: Perfection in a DrySak!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just returned from a wonderful vacation in Belize and this DrySak was the envy of my whole group.....It went from Yoga to Snorkeling and was perfect on the only mode of transportation (Golf Cart) on the island of Ambergris Caye....We were caught in a rain storm and everyone scrambled to put there purses in my DrySak......it was SO nice. Other gals had DrySak's but not has heavy duty and great as this one! - Don't be surprised if you receive 7 orders from my friends! I highly recommend!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: I went on a 5 day motorcycle trip and easily packed plenty of clothes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 20ml dry sak. I went on a 5 day motorcycle trip and easily packed plenty of clothes....I actually had clothes I didn't wear and could have packed more. The bag rolls up nice and tight and was perfect as a "roll" bag on the back of my bike. We only hit small amounts of rain but I enjoyed not having to worry about my clothes getting wet. Very well made and great quality materials. I love this bag....best purchase in a long time ....I think my motorcycle friends will be placing their orders soon. :)
customer_reviews.author: Lori A. Hoefer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awesome multi purpose bag that works exactly as promised!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome product. Took a cruise and used this on several excursions ... Jamaica and Mexico. My stuff remained clean and dry and it was great to use. I’m ordering one for my traveling buddy for their birthday too as they liked mine so much. As an aside.. while trying to wash a few items in my cabin, i ended up using this bag to not only wash, but rinse my laundry too. How can. Ya beat that?
customer_reviews.author: K. Quinlan

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer!
customer_reviews.text: I received item pretty quick right before my trip to Florida. I recently just got back and this bag is sure waterproof. While we were snorkeling, it started raining and i had my boyfriend's Canon camera in the bag. When we checked the bag, the camera was fine. Nothing in the bag got wet. Our towels and clothes were dry. The small zippered pocket, i didn't have anything in it, but saw on other reviews that it wasn't waterproof. Didn't really check. This bag is worth getting!
customer_reviews.author: CORDEROC

customer_reviews.title: Best product!!!! A must have for boating, river, beach fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this dry bag. It worked great on the river yesterday. Went tubing....over rapids...lol...fell in and accidentally grabbed the bag too. I was soaked and so was the bag. Opened the bag to check on my phone and my husband's (oops) and it was perfectly dry. However, I did get the small one. Wish I would have gotten the one a size up. With my stuff, my daughters, and my husband's...it was a lil snug in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: rmvf

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! Keeps my goods nice and dry!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome drysak! I use when I go out on my SUP and it keeps my goods nice and dry. I have dropped it in the water multiple times and it hasn't let a drop of water in. I place it under elastic cargo straps on my board and then wrap the strap in and out of the cargo straps for extra security. It looks very sporty and appealing to me. I purchased the larger size and just roll it down when I don't need as much room. Perfect for my needs, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: loriann

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag for diving or just hitting the sites.
customer_reviews.text: While not a pretty or easy to carry bag, it did it job well. I went scuba diving in cancun and the waves got everything on deck wet, but not the contents of the this bag. We also hit the sites and this bag was light and very versital. I just had a small towell in it at first, then I added things to it as we went. The "Roll up" seal can be rolled all the way down if empty or all the way to the top of full. So easy to adjust. I will use this on any dive, or any chance I will be even close to water or rain. Great bag
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Berry

customer_reviews.title: Will likely buy another!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as described. Hardware, zipper, fittings seem to be well made. Have taken it out on the boat over the last few weeks and have been pleased. Proactive customer service and follow up from Nick - overall great experience.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: We canoe, kayak, paddleboard and boat throughout the summer as well as come & go to beach. Nothing extreme. Just needed something that would keep my phone, wallet, a sandwich and book dry in transit. This sack is perfect for that. It is not waterproof, it is water resistant. It does not have the ziplock enclosure feature some dry bags have. Not a big deal for us. The 10L size was just right for my needs. Also keeps the seagulls out- bonus!
customer_reviews.author: HDTX

customer_reviews.title: Not a drop.
customer_reviews.text: Best dry bag ever! I use the heck out of this. Snorkeling, mudding beach. Not a drop of water can penetrate this bag. Easy to clean too.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately not the waterproof bag I had hoped for
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 20L version of this bag for my lazy rafting and white rafting excursions, and the first day out with this bag, my small front zipper pocket was filled with water (that goodness for water resistant phones nowadays) and the main compartment was filled with moisture, causing my towel and clothes to be damp. I had only opened the main compartment twice while on the rafting trip and hadn’t opened the small pocket since before we got on the raft. Overall, very disappointed that the bag was not fully waterproof, but I do enjoy the size and option to have a strap on the bag.
customer_reviews.author: lylede

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to open these for Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these as gifts for my husband. They are currently wrapped and under my Christmas tree, so I have not had an opportunity to use them yet. I will say they are constructed very well and are the perfect sizes for the needs they are meant for. They are beautifully packaged with care. I am looking forward to seeing how they work in and around the water.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Abbey

customer_reviews.title: This dry bag is awesome! I got it to keep phones and cameras ...
customer_reviews.text: This dry bag is awesome! I got it to keep phones and cameras and other items we didn't want to get wet on a river float and it was perfect! It got dunked and ended up in a boat that wet folks kept getting in and out of and everything stayed dry! I also love the strap that comes with it so it was easy and comfortable to wear as a crossbody bag during our hike down to the river and back up to the road. I might have to order another for my husband next year!
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I just received my dry bag within the past week and haven't had a chance to put it to the test yet, but it appears to be very well made and very durable. It is big enough (20 liters) to fit the gear I take with me in my kayak that needs to stay dry, yet small enough to be stuffed into the back of the boat. And I like having the outside pocket to keep small items more easily accessible.
customer_reviews.author: Doodlebug

customer_reviews.title: Water Resistant Only
customer_reviews.text: While I like the product, I wouldn’t buy again or recommend specifically. Quality of material is great. I love having the handle to be able to wear as a backpack. However, in order to be very “waterproof” you have to roll down quite a few times, and then there is no longer much room left in the bag. Great product if you are simply looking for water resistant, but if you plan on playing in the water, or risk bag being submerged in water, I wouldn’t risk important electronics being placed in bag without additional protection.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Jones

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Took this bag with us whitewater rafting. It was great, went thru rapids several times that totally soaked the boat and everything inside the bag stayed dry. Items in outside pocket did get wet but that is in the product description so I was aware of that. I purchased the large bag and I liked the size because after rolling down the top 3 times to seal the amount of space left was large enough. I liked the strap that is attached for carrying the bag
customer_reviews.author: Crazy 4 Shoes

customer_reviews.title: Dry and Spacious
customer_reviews.text: Took this dry bag out for it's first kayak run a couple days ago. It's a lot roomier than I expected and stayed completely dry. I did not test the front pouch because the instructions said it was resistant, not water proof, but overall I'm happy with my purchase and even got a couple compliments on it from the livery staff.
customer_reviews.author: Tina M. Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bag! i purchased the larger one and I am so happy with it. Plenty of space, the shoulder strap is wonderful, and we threw it in the lake to 'test' it and everything inside stayed nice and dry...we even submerged the bag! You have to roll it correctly so just pay attention to that. I would but this for all water travel/use. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm in Hawaii trip! Pick a light colored one!
customer_reviews.text: Not only did this keep my family’s electronics, towels, etc dry, but it also is small enough to be a hand-carry item. It is easy to carry and hope it will last longer than what I expected. I would not fully submerge this, but it has shown than splashes, heavy rain or placing over very moist or wet environments did not affect the contents at all. I was lucky that the gray was available, or it would have overheated with a darker color out in the sun...
customer_reviews.author: Rey C.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Took on a recent vacation and never had to worry about items getting wet. For the days with less items, this rolled down to be more compact. Received several compliments on it and would definitely recommend this products.
customer_reviews.author: K. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Such a great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of our best purchases. We used this on our cruise and took it out on a lot of water based excursions. NOTHING will get wet in this bag. It also fit, 2 large beach towels, change of clothes, sunscreen, 2 books and 2 bottles of water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice big bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is nice. It's very large and I have not yet tested out water resistance as our trip is next month. However it is rubbery and seems adequate for that. We don't plan on taking it in the water we just got it to haul all our things to the beach we got the large size and it nicely accommodates ALOT. Only reason for 4 not 5 stars is I feel the strap is too long even at its shortest setting and I would like to carry it on my right shoulder not my left where the strap is. Just me though. Nice bag.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag for many uses!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is the bomb! The material is a rubber-like heavy material. Very sturdy feeling. The 20L is a bit large for my short arms (I'm 5'2") to reach to the very bottom, so I gave this to my husband. He keeps his "scent free" hunting gear in it and it will travel well when it is raining. He loves the bag. I had to order the 10L for my use at pool while on vacation. I like this bag and it should work perfectly and hold up well. I feel comfortable keeping my iPhone and things like that in it so they stay dry.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Did not place in water but brought with us to all water activities and items stay dried and easy to wipe down bag
customer_reviews.text: Used on a cruise. Did not place in water but brought with us to all water activities and items stay dried and easy to wipe down bag. There is no zipper or seal on the top. You simply roll to secure in place.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: My husband was always carrying his toiletries in a plastic grocery bag when we traveled. It was tacky looking and products could still leak. I bought him this dry bag because it is tall enough for his full sized products for long trips and it can be sealed up so it doesn't leak. If product leaks, it is contained and the bag washes out easily, plus it is strong and the bottom won't give out. Glad we got it, works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey KC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for the outdoorsman
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the DrySak Waterproof bag! I purchased it as a birthday gift for a friend and he loved it! He is very into hiking, jet skiing, boating and kayaking, so I think this was the perfect gift. Thank you, Amazon, for another good experience!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Thompson

customer_reviews.title: A Must for Solo Travelers!
customer_reviews.text: This bag was my life saver to keep my wallet, passport, camera, mobile, towel, dress, and lunch dry while safely on me while I swam! No fear of theft on the beach when I could bring all my valuables along with me on my swim! As a solo traveler this bag was in the water swimming with me every day for hours during five weeks of travels through nine countries! The small pocket was great for holding coins or money bills that could get wet, but for easy access. The items inside my bag stayed dry the entire time. The color true to the pink on the photos. I got stopped by everyone interested in the bag. Loved this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Miriam

customer_reviews.title: Day Bag Usr
customer_reviews.text: Actually love my DrySak. Works perfectly as I use it daily. If i could make one suggestion. Design and add an insert with 3 or 4 dividers. Since I bicycle and carry extra clothes, laptop, papers and books along with other personal items such as glasses, cell phones, chargers and even athletic tapes. Items tend to get a little lost in the bottom. But the DrySak is everything I really need in a day type bag
customer_reviews.author: ClareKO

customer_reviews.title: Durable and roomy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my trip to the Bahamas last year. It is great. I use it now for my stand up paddleboard, I keep it with me as I am paddling. I always use it for the beach or lake. It is really durable, and is roomy enough for a towel, suncreen, phone, etc. It is easy to close and the generous strap makes it easy to carry over the shoulder, or wrapped around the bungee on my stand up paddleboard.
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: I purchased the same one earlier this year for a tubing trip we did and the bag worked great. It floated along the raft
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for an upcoming family vacation where we will be surrounded by water. I purchased the same one earlier this year for a tubing trip we did and the bag worked great. It floated along the raft, I didn't have to worry about my phone getting wet. Everything inside it stayed dry. I put some stuff in the zippered pocket which is not necessarily waterproof however nothing did get wet in that exterior zipper pocket. I ended up purchasing four more as gifts. I really like these bags and am impressed with the quality. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: S. Mro

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Would leave zero stars if possible. Bought this for when I’m float tube fishing. Bag was never submerged, it sat on top of some water and was splashed a couple times. Thanks to this “dry” bag, my wallet, cell phone and money got completely soaked. Complete garbage!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pink color is easy to see floating away.
customer_reviews.text: Used several times but only once was it really used. That time the pink floating bag was easily seen and recovered. Contents were dry. That trip was the first time we left the strap and the first capsize in a long time. Lucky to have it. Time will tell how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Nicer Than Average

customer_reviews.title: Bought for beach use
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, thick material. I bought this for beach use, very easy to brush or hose off sand while keeping contents dry. Contents get a bit warmer than a traditional cloth bag. If the exterior pocket were a bit bigger to fit a smartphone, I'd have given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: D. Quatrini

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have for Boating Fun
customer_reviews.text: This has been such a lifesaver for pontooning fun. It’s super roomy and holds everything from my phone to a beach towel. And most importantly, it works! I’ve swung the strap around my shoulder and dragged it through water and everything remained dry. Note that the outer pocket is not waterproof per the product details.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M

customer_reviews.title: No regrets here so far :)
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of this. Good size for going to water park. Can fit medium size camera, wallet, phone, iPad, squeeze in a shirt, and light towel. Color is great, appears well constructed and shoulder strap is not flimsy. The outside zipper-- provides quick access for few bills&change and a couple credit cards.
customer_reviews.author: M. G. Genciana

customer_reviews.title: 20L is actually pretty large and can fit multiple towels and other things
customer_reviews.text: BEYOND my expectations for the price. 20L is actually pretty large and can fit multiple towels and other things. I wish it came with 2 straps (I should have done my research) and carrying this over one shoulder full will be slightly uncomfortable but then again I am shorter. I love this though, no complaints really. Going to find myself another strap. I also purchased a 10L and its the perfect size, can fit a towel
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GOOD QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. I have taken it canoeing and as a boat bag in the deck boat and it seems to work just fine. I like that is has the outside zipper pocket, make for easy access to small items like lighters, ect that would normally fall to the bottom of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: This survived an 8 hour drunken river trip. It was opened and closed half a million times as my wife needed to get her phone out to take pictures everytime anything happened ever. So I feel it would be durable enough for any reasonable person to use
customer_reviews.author: Alex Seda

customer_reviews.title: Great for Boating
customer_reviews.text: We love our bags! Very roomy for extra change of clothes and electronics. Rolls tight for waterproofing and has a strap to carry over your shoulder. We bring this and the 10L on our boat. We plan to use for camping weekends as well.
customer_reviews.author: lyni09

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I threw caution to the wind and first used this bag on a tubing trip, letting it dunk its way down the Shenandoah. Word to the wise: somewhat unsurprisingly, don't expect the front pocket to be waterproof! But it was high in demand and kept everything dry over several hours down the river - though the fuller it got, the more risky that got with rolling enough to keep out water. I got the 10L and it was just right. Light, sleek, and easy to carry (I'm a fan of the strap), seems pretty durable thus far. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what you want it to do, keeps stuff dry
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how anyone could say this thing will not keep your stuff dry. If you follow the instructions, it keep stuff very dry. Dropped it into the river because my carabiner came open (I didn't think that was possible) but it just floated on top and took about 15 seconds to get over to it. Dry!! (inside of course)
customer_reviews.author: Marlo M

customer_reviews.title: Best waterproof bag for traveling !!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this bag... I took it to Cancun used it for all cenotes and rivers ....everyone put their wallets and keys in it.... It kept everything dry... I refused to leave my wallet in the lockers they had with all my cash and credit cards... So I strapped it over my shoulder and it floated with me in every water activity I we got into... I give it 10 stars and everyone said they will be purchasing one for our next Cancun trip...luv it
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my paddleboard
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag!!! Everyone wants it when they see it. I also have a briefcase in this same brand as I am a swim coach and needed a completely waterproof briefcase. This bag is so waterproof, you could use it as a float.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel E Loy

customer_reviews.title: Successful gift for a fisherman
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my boyfriend's dad, who is notoriously difficult to shop for. He seemed really surprised and pleased with it, and everyone was impressed with the quality and usefulness. He fishes on his boat often, and has even fallen off once, so he said this would be perfect to keep his most important items dry and safe, like his phone and 4 to 5 honeybuns 😂
customer_reviews.author: Kerry C.

customer_reviews.title: 20L is pretty large
customer_reviews.text: 20L Sak is much bigger than expected. Was hoping to use as a personal item on a plane also,you can make it work but will have to fold it over a few times.If you want to stuff a couple beach towels along with your other personal items this bag will do the trick. If you are looking for something more inconspicuous get the smaller 10L
customer_reviews.author: Partyof4

customer_reviews.title: Smells so strong
customer_reviews.text: I had to return it because no amount of airing it out got rid of that strong plastic smell. The smell actually clung to my hands and I had to wash them extra good to get the smell off.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Champion

customer_reviews.title: Won't let water out
customer_reviews.text: I've capsized in my kayak and this bag filled up with water. Which weight down the kayak. It held the water in good, but I was trying to keep the content of the bag dry. The zipper did well. You can use it as a cheap sand anchor.
customer_reviews.author: MAJ StewR

customer_reviews.title: Great water resistant bag with heavy duty buckles
customer_reviews.text: This is a good heavy duty bag perfect for keeping things dry and to easily keep track of your stuff. The X ternal works well to hold my wallet or watch for easy access. If you're caring snorkel masks and fins I would suggest the larger bag of the two.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Had all non-waterproof possessions in my bag while I floated down the Colorado River in a small raft. It worked beautifully! I even had a sub sandwich and crackers and they were fresh and dry!!! Highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Orangecrushie

customer_reviews.title: I’m pretty sure it would sink and everything would get soaked ...
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it is intended to do. I wish it had a waterproof zipper or something. You close it just by folding it and clipping it. So technically it’s not 100 percent waterproof. I’m pretty sure it would sink and everything would get soaked it feel in the water. Great for pool side or beach but I wouldn’t purposely leave it somewhere it could get wet
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Pettola

customer_reviews.title: Great Design
customer_reviews.text: The design is what caught my eye. Great color and details. Outside zip pocket for small valuables is a MUST. Buckle clasp is very functional with the sling strap. After I purchased it, the company sent me a care manual - on the best way to care for my DrySak. The company really seemed to care about my business. Will be buying more products from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift for my father in law who ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my father in law who lives on a lake and regularly needs to transport items from the house to the boat and keep them dry. He has had no issues with items getting wet while in the bag. He has not fully submerged the bag but it has sat on top of with the bottom slightly submerged and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Also keeps water in
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item - to keep water in - I go to the pool and have very wet clothing along with my other gym/shower equipment. It is a great size - it fits more than I need and for them most part all is dry on the outside. The color is great - just like the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Fish

customer_reviews.title: great waterproof bag
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this bag so far. If you've had or have other waterproof bags this one won't surprise you as it has the pretty normal roll top single clasp closure, small zippered compartment on the outside and a shoulder strap. Since I haven't had it long enough to mention it's durability I will say it seems well constructed and looking forward to seeing how long it lasts as I tend to be a bit hard on my bags. As it stands now I like it enough to order their 10L bag as well because it's hard to go wrong with a good waterproof bag in a variety of sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this bag for a dive trip, used it first on a lake trip we took. Worked great. I never dunked it in the water but it worked great with splash and water on the boat everything g stayed dry dry dry. I loved the little pocket on the front easy access....I put extra Go pro batteries in there it worked great. We are ordering a larger one for our dive trip.
customer_reviews.author: mtngirl

customer_reviews.title: WATERPROOF Dry Bag
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, definitely worth what paid for, it is much larger than you think/believe, exactly what I was looking for. Easy to pack and carry to the beach, pool or best of all when going on a cruise and taking water/shore excursions and you NEED to keep your belongings DRY. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: PapaRon75

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a Great Dry Bag
customer_reviews.text: This looks like a great dry bag. I will use it soon. The order was very smoothly handled and at great speed. I had the bag a day after I ordered it. Looks like a really good company. Jeff
customer_reviews.author: J. Stickle

customer_reviews.title: The Superhero bag of the river...
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag!! It's super cute & worked perfectly. I took it to the river this past weekend & it was all up in the water. Everything stayed bone dry. My whole group put their stuff in it (it fits everything) and they all said they going to get one for our next trip. Great product, exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amstar35e

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bag to use when kayaking
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bag to use when kayaking! The small size DrySak is large enough for a towel and a few other items. The zipper front pocket does get water inside, so be sure to enclose anything that could ruin in a plastic baggie. I also purchased a large DrySac which has plenty of room for additional items you may want to keep dry. Quality is great, thick material, and easily carried or attached to kayak with the strap. Definitely a much needed item for all of my water sports (even getting caught in the rain)!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca C. Meadows

customer_reviews.title: cool bag
customer_reviews.text: its a cool little bag, my idea is to use it in my backpack, for biking in the rain, if it rained so much i wasn't riding , i could put everything and my backpack , in the waterproof bag, i like the design ! hope its really waterproof! even has a strap / simpler and longer lasting in my idea than a waterproof backpack costing much more , since its not seattle but when it rains i do want to be dry!! thanks
customer_reviews.author: the bird

customer_reviews.title: keeps stuff dry
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to keep my stuff dry during kayaking. It works as demonstrated by me capsizing the first time I used the bag. Good size - not too big, not too small.
customer_reviews.author: chunkybeefstyle

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a birthday gift for a family member. Looks very durable and was pleased with the larger size. This will be great for them at the lake to take on the boat or family vacations.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Quality and practical
customer_reviews.text: High quality and very practical for several ourdoor purposes ( hiking, beach, etc). We bought three of theese Bags (one for each in my family) and we are all happy with it. I find very practical the strap for carrying on the shoulder, an accessory many other dry bags do not have. Excellent product we highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LUIS GROSSO

customer_reviews.title: Dr Scuba
customer_reviews.text: I have my vacation to go scuba diving to Cocos Island in December. The dry bag is much better vinyl than my old clear bag which was stiff. Even though I have not used it yet on the liveaboard, but I feel that it will perform quite well. At first I thought that the 20L size was too big, but with other stuff, esp a towel, extra mask, snorkel, etcd it will accommodate everything quite nicely. I am pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marie E. Schlentz

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this well made dry bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a Dry Sak for a recent trip to the Virgin Islands. I wanted a water/sand proof bag to protect my camera, This is a tough bag! It floats! I took it to the beach, hiking, and on the boat and kayak. No water, rain, dirt, sand, or dust penetrated it. I highly recommend this well made dry bag!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The color is bright and easy to spot
customer_reviews.text: I got there larger size, which actually was bigger than I anticipated. I've taken this on the boat and down the river, and everything in the main portion stayed dry with average splashing. I can't vouch how well it does completely submerged though. And remember, the front zipper pocket is NOT designed to be waterproof! The color is bright and easy to spot, it seems to seal up well, and I love the straps to help carry it around.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Recommend.  Great quality & price.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and super value. Best dry pack I could find based on reviews and value. High quality. Bought a 2nd one, as a gift. 20L size is what you need for beach or hiking. 10L is for one person vs we use 20L for Family needs.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Worked fantastic, kept everything dry on a very wet catamaran ride! I would suggest the 20 if you want to put towels in there, the 10 fit 2 light changes of clothes, phone, ID and keys very comfortably but just wasn't tall enough for towels unless you don't roll the top down but then you lose the complete waterproof protection.
customer_reviews.author: carriegree

customer_reviews.title: All business
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my DSLR while paddling to my island campsite. Holds a lot of gear. The bag is thick, and mounts to my paddle board perfectly. Very sturdy construction and the strap adds to functionality. I am looking forward to using this continuously. Additional comment regards its price point. The bag is more than worth it . It is a steal!
customer_reviews.author: Paulus Maximus

customer_reviews.title: No way to close the top
customer_reviews.text: This is neat, however there is no zipper or way to close the top, we haven’t used it yet. I would think on a jet ski this would leak. Will update when I try it
customer_reviews.author: Lara Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Very worth the money great product!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Got it as a boat dry bag to keep my phone, wallet etc. it works great keeping everything dry and has been completely soaked it on the boat. Make sure you read the directions. I started using it for other occasions now when I may get wet. Couldn’t be happier to ad this bag to my bag collection.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Worry Free Boat Storage
customer_reviews.text: Purchased several of these bags, to keep items dry and safe. Also to use while boating!, Great quality! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my kayak trips. Great size for my extra clothes if I need them on the water. Sturdy and highly visible if you end up in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Hackenberg

customer_reviews.title: Best dry bag ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best dry bag I’ve ever had! It comes in handy every time we have to go somewhere and it’s raining. It is very reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Emm D

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a winner
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our family white elephant exchange. HUGE hit! I have several people in the family that hike and kayak and this gift was stole more than any other. Most already had one and wanted another because they work so well. Guess I'll be adding one to my outdoor gear hiking collection.
customer_reviews.author: MommaK

customer_reviews.title: Nice and dry
customer_reviews.text: This bag was great took the boat out yesterday and tried the new water proof bag. And everything your products say, it does. Kept all of my wife's things dry and handy. I was so impressed I ordered a second on for my daughter. Thanks, your products worked great
customer_reviews.author: John Keating

customer_reviews.title: Surpassed Expectation!
customer_reviews.text: This product went above my expectation! The quality is top notch! Exactly what I was looking for. It was bigger then I expected but can be compact if the extra room is not needed. Very well made! All my stuff stays dry and protected when I am paddle boarding. Very pleased.love the color too.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Put it to use
customer_reviews.text: Will we have given it a work out. Used for quite sometime and passed all our abuse, wish we had another one, tired packing my stuff and wife’s carrying around ha ha
customer_reviews.author: earl

customer_reviews.title: great seal
customer_reviews.text: The product has only been used twice, but has held up very well & delivers on the product description 100%. Good value/build for the price. We did not try submerging the product at all, though we did an inflate test & it held air over night, a good sign before using the product in the water.
customer_reviews.author: G. Milner

product_meta.title: Skog Å Kust DrySåk Waterproof Floating Dry Bag with Exterior Zippered Pocket | for Kayaking, Rafting, Boating, Swimming, Camping, Hiking, Beach, Fishing | 10L & 20L Sizes
feature_bullets: RUGGED ALL-WEATHER PROTECTION: DrySak is made from heavy duty 500-D PVC to seal out the elements. The watertight, welded seams and roll-down top provide IPX-6 protection for your gear in a variety of outdoor sports and activities.

QUICK ACCESS TO KEYS & ID: Splash-proof outer zip pocket safely stores small essentials. You'll easily reach your must-haves without having to rummage through your bag whether you are kayaking, hiking or relaxing on the beach.
KEEPS YOU SAFELY VISIBLE AT NIGHT: Reflective trim around pocket zipper helps ensure you'll be seen. Plus, it helps you spot & retrieve your bag if it ever falls overboard.
REMOVABLE ADJUSTABLE SHOULDER STRAP: Sling the strap over your shoulder to easily tote your gear anywhere. Or attach the strap to your boat or kayak to keep your bag conveniently at hand.
10 LITERS & 20 LITERS, YOUR CHOICE: Both our 10L and 20L sizes feature our sleek, simple design - no tacky slogans or garish logos. Plus, both are fully guaranteed.
